column4: how do i get my server to stop asking for my passphrase when i login? if i do ssh-keygen -t rsa locally and leave the passphrase empty it will still ask me
i do "ssh myserver.com" and it asks me for a passphrase even though it's empty
you can setup a file that holds username and passwords for ssh but its not really a good idea
i feel like this isn't typical behavior but is it?
i think from other computers it doesn't ask me cause it knows there isn't one? or something?
ssh will always ask for a password if the ssh user file is not there
